title: Ranked Teams?
body: There is no option to start a ranked team lobby for me. There is just ranked where i can invite 5 (doesnt add onto ranked team stats).

replies.body:
Hey there!

For at least the duration of this season (Season 6), Ranked 5v5 Teams have been replaced by Dynamic Queue, as SephirothSG mentioned. Ranked 3v3's are still active on other servers; however, it's not available for Oceania at this time. 

For more information about this decision, check out Riot Lyte's announcement:

> [{quoted}](name=Lyte,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=HGblb9fH,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-19T07:34:18.835+0000)
>
> Because Dynamic Ranked is an indisputably better experience for playing with friends, the Ranked Teams queue skips the 2016 season while we begin work to integrate the full team experience into Dynamic Ranked.

Full Post: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback

Hey there,

My current understanding is that ranked teams are now defunct and have been replaced with the dynamic queue feature, however I'll see if I can dig up some more info.
